resolution.summary: Phase 6 test infrastructure complete: (1) Ported assembler to Python 3 with all bug fixes (Message elif nesting, Verbosity reference, global lines, SGT regex, integer division). (2) Created test_basic.asm — directed test program covering R-type ALU ops, shifts, load immediate, memory store. (3) Created GHDL Makefile with analyze/sim/wave/clean targets. (4) Created self-checking test bench tb_basic.vhd with memory write monitoring. (5) Fixed progmem.vhd VHDL-87 file syntax for VHDL-2008 compatibility. Successfully compiled all 18 VHDL files and ran simulation — confirmed bugs: all ALU results are 0x0000 (forwarding broken), J-to-self doesn't halt (flush disabled), only LIW works (direct register load bypasses ALU).
